message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a little high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $80.

I understand that $80 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm now offering the product to you for $110. This is a fair price, considering the value the product brings to you.
